# Simplified comprehensive test without env commands

# Test 1: Help command - should work without auth
exec ./nlm_test help
stderr 'Usage: nlm <command>'
stderr 'Notebook Commands'

# Test 2: Invalid command handling
! exec ./nlm_test invalid-command
stderr 'Usage: nlm'

# Test 3: Argument validation
! exec ./nlm_test notes
stderr 'usage: nlm notes <notebook-id>'

# Test 4: Create without args
! exec ./nlm_test create
stderr 'usage: nlm create <title>'

# Test 5: Help flag
exec ./nlm_test -h
stderr 'Usage: nlm <command>'
stderr 'Notebook Commands'
